data.name: Ilya Sutskever
data.about: Ilya Sutskever FRS is a Russian-born Israeli-Canadian computer scientist working in machine learning, who co-founded and serves as board member and Chief Scientist of OpenAI. He has made several major contributions to the field of deep learning.

data.name: Greg Brockman
data.about: Greg Brockman is an American entrepreneur, investor and software developer who is a co-founder and, until November 2023, was the president of OpenAI. He began his career at Stripe in 2010, upon leaving MIT, and became their CTO in 2013. He left Stripe in 2015 to co-found OpenAI, where he also assumed the role of CTO.

data.name: Mira Murati
data.about: Mira Murati is an Albanian engineer and business manager. She has been serving as chief technology officer of OpenAI since 2018 and as interim chief executive officer of OpenAI since November 17, 2023.

data.name: Sam Altman
data.about: Samuel Harris Altman is an American entrepreneur and investor. He previously served as chief executive officer of OpenAI from 2019 to 2023 and as president of Y Combinator from 2014 to 2019. He now serves as a lead of an advanced AI research team at Microsoft.
